attributes.action: Legislate so that when a new human life is conceived it has full human rights.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Conception to death is a continuum. At any stage, development of the individual is "work in progress". At certain stages discontinuities occur such as birth, puberty, menopause but these do not interrupt the flow of life, Where there is human life there are human rights. At conception a child should have full human rights.
